Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between Pulaski and Austin
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to a track condition near Cicero; board all trains on the Forest Park-bound side at Pulaski, Cicero and Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service is running with delays due to a track condition near Cicero.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Pulaski and Austin stations.

Board/exit all trains on the Forest Park-bound side of the platform at Pulaski, Cicero and Austin stations.

Shuttle buses are available at Forest Park and Pulaski to provide connecting service.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
